participant_1.background:
I am a tour guide that speaks Spanish and English.
my mother is a school teacher.
my mother is a professional make up artist.
i am college student.
I have no pets, but I like to spend my free time listening to music and taking pictures.

participant_2.background:
My family accepts me as I am, even with my red hair and my history of working for Monsanto.
My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.
My family works in various fields, but we all have a passion for life.
I live in California, where I am pursuing my dream of becoming a fashion designer.
I like to make clothes in my favorite color, blue.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How are you doing?
I'm doing great, thank you! I'm a college student and I'm studying to become a tour guide. I speak Spanish and English.
That's so cool! I'm a fashion designer in California. I love my job and I get to be creative every day.
That's awesome! What's your favorite color to use when designing clothes?
My favorite color is blue. I love how it looks on everyone and it's so versatile.
Blue is my favorite color too! I love how it can be both calming and energetic.
I agree! What's your favorite part about being a fashion designer?
I love getting to see my designs come to life. It's so rewarding to see people wearing my clothes and feeling confident in them.
That's amazing! I'm sure you make people so happy.
Well, you're doing a great job!
